channel.title: sandbox on Nguyen Hoang Trung
channel.description: Recent content in sandbox on Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: Google CTF 2020 teleport Chromium sandbox escape
item.description: Teleport Please write a full-chain exploit for Chrome. The flag is at /home/user/flag. Maybe there’s some way to teleit out of there? 1. Story Hi, last week I participated in Google CTF 2020 with my team pwnPHOfun Although I didn’t solve the challenge in time for the points, still, here is a writeup for the challenge teleport for you. I like to write detailed articles that are understandable and replicable to my past self.

item.title: TetCTF babySandbox
item.description: Baby Sandbox This is a challenge of TetCTF, which is hosted from Jan 1st to Jan 7th by MeePwn Team of Vietnam Challenge description We are given 2 binary, one is sandbox and the other one is program. sandbox, judging by its name, is a implementation of sandbox, executing the program passed in argv[1] in an sandbox environment. program is executed by sandbox, which is a simple static stripped executable which simply reads your input and then output it.
